# South Carolina House of Representatives District 77

## About

South Carolina House of Representatives District 77 is a state legislative district
in South Carolina. The district is located in Berkeley County.

## Current representative

**William Chen** (Republican) is the incumbent representative for this district.
He has served since 2022.

## 2026 election

### General election

The general election for South Carolina House of Representatives District 77
will take place on November 3, 2026.

### Candidates

The following candidates are running in the 2026 election:

#### Republican Party

**William Chen** (Republican) - incumbent

#### Democratic Party

**Amanda Foster** (Democratic)

#### Independent

**Christopher Davis** (Independent)

#### Libertarian Party

**Marcus Green** (Libertarian)

## Previous elections

### 2024 election

**William Chen** (Republican) defeated **James Miller** (Democratic)
with 54% of the vote.

### 2022 election

**William Chen** (Republican) defeated **Linda Jackson** (Democratic)
with 51% of the vote.

## District demographics

The district has a population of approximately 44,000 residents.
